name: Make A Jigsaw Puzzle
description: In《Make A Jigsaw Puzzle》you can customize the length and width of the puzzle, the picture and the puzzle edge. Then you can play it on a platform that could move freely .
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel® i7-4790 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970 Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: only been tested on HTC Vive
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
